title: The Room (2003) 720p Rifftrax 6ch 2ch FANEDIT No Love Scenes
description:

THIS IS A FANEDIT OF THE ROOM WITH RIFFTRAX WITH NO LOVE SCENES

The Room (2003) FANEDIT No Love Scenes
video: 1280x720 AVC

intro: 1s after the last riff comment
Rifftrax released 2009.06.18 1h29m04s 1,604,735,855bytes

This is a remux with the Rifftrax commentary added as the default audio track. The Rifftrax audio track has been newly remastered to ensure the riff comments are just loud enough to be clear when the movie is loud and not too loud when the movie is quiet. Please leave any feedback regarding the Rifftrax audio remastering.

Big thanks to the posters of the 720p/5.1 encodes of the movies.

If this Rifftrax was enjoyable, you haven't paid for it and you have a few dollars to spare, please consider purchasing this riff (3.99USD) or make a general donation (5USD and up) - they take Bitcoin now too  

FANEDIT NO LOVE SCENES - FANEDIT NO LOVE SCENES - FANEDIT NO LOVE SCENES

The love scenes are exceedingly painful to watch in The Room. And while the Rifftrax gang did their best with hideous love scene lemons to make hilarious lemonade, the results can weaken with repeated viewings. So if you really love The Room but you want to skip the love scenes, this fan edit is for you. 

Here are the cut points in the fan edit and the cut ranges for the full movie:
05.26 05.26-09.04 Johnny Lisa #1 The Red Dress, DisembAudio and G-Dimes
13.35 17.14-19.32 Mark Lisa #1 Cheating Begins, DisembAudio and Walter
20.02 25.59-27.10 Johnny Lisa #2 Pizza Drunk, DisembAudio and Randall
22.52 30.00-31.11 Michelle Mike Eating In, DisembAudio calls ahead
57.07 65.25-67.38 Mark Lisa #2 More Cheating, "There's a Hole in My Bucket"

Don't worry about it, you still get to fully enjoy Johnny's magnificent butt plus you get a few shots of Lisa's beautiful topless body when Johnny is having his extended flashback near the end of the film.

The previous bsg4you version of this fanedit was 1,357,448,362bytes and named:
Rifftrax.The.Room.2003.720p.FANEDIT.no-love-scenes.mkv

This new version of The Room FANEDIT No Love Scenes has the following changes:
* remastered 2.0 Riff audio track, riffs are much quieter compared to the older revs
* NEW! 5.1 movie-only and 2.0 movie-only soundtrack options
* fewer cut points resulting in a cleaner edit with better, more consistent synch
